sense.gloss: to kill, to slay, to murder, to slaughter
to suppress, to block, to hamper, to destroy (e.g. talent), to eliminate (e.g. an odour), to spoil (e.g. a flavour), to kill (e.g. one's speed)
to suppress (a voice, feelings, etc.), to hold back, to stifle (a yawn, laugh, etc.), to hold (one's breath)
to pawn, to put in hock

sdata.j: ↑金↑↓きん↓の↑卵↑↓たまご↓を↑生↑↓う↓むガチョウを↑殺↑↓|ころ↓す|な。
sdata.e: Don't kill the goose that lays the golden eggs.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いち↓↑歩↑↓ほ↓でも↑動↑↓うご↓けばおまえを↑殺↑↓|ころ↓す|ぞ。
sdata.e: If you move a step, and you will be a dead man.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いち↓↑度↑↓ど↓↑殺↑↓|ころ↓す|と、↑殺↑↓ころ↓しが↑楽↑↓たの↓しくなる。
sdata.e: Once we've killed, we enjoy killing.

sdata.j: その↑中↑↓なか↓の１↑人↑↓にん↓は↑俳優↑↓はいゆう↓で、↑誰↑↓だれ↓かを↑殺↑↓|ころ↓す|ふりをするのです。
sdata.e: One of them is an actor, who is going to pretend to murder someone.

sdata.j: ジェーンは↑若↑↓わか↓い↑頃↑↓|ころ↓ス|チュワーデスだった。
sdata.e: Jane was a stewardess when she was young.

sdata.j: ジェーンは↑学校↑↓がっこう↓↑時代↑↓じだい↓↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑一番↑↓いちばん↓の↑友人↑↓ゆうじん↓のひとりだったが、ここのと|ころ↑数↑↓す|う↓↑年↑↓ねん↓の↑内↑↓うち↓にだんだんお↑互↑↓たが↓いに↑離↑↓はな↓れて↑行↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: Jane used to be one of my best friends at school but we've drifted apart over the past few years.

sdata.j: これまでのと|ころす|べて↑順調↑↓じゅんちょう↓だ。
sdata.e: So far everything has been going well.

sdata.j: これまでのと|ころす|べてが↑順調↑↓じゅんちょう↓だ。
sdata.e: So far everything has been going well.

sdata.j: これは↑彼↑↓かれ↓らが↑子供↑↓こども↓の↑頃↑↓|ころ↓↑住↑↓す|↓んでいた↑家↑↓いえ↓です。
sdata.e: This is the house in which they lived when they were children.

sdata.j: これは、その↑詩人↑↓しじん↓が↑子↑↓こ↓どもの|ころ↑住↑↓す|↓んでいた↑家↑↓いえ↓です。
sdata.e: This is the house in which the poet lived in his childhood.
